thread.section_title: Nutrisystem Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nutrisystem | nutrisystem.com
thread.title: Susan Morgan

author: Susan Morgan
title: Susan Morgan
text: I got the program of "favorites" because it was all I could afford. The food was mostly bars. Bars for breakfast, bars for lunch, bars for snacks. I quickly became tired of this food. Not only that, I signed up for this program because I received an e-mail offering a discount of 200.00. When I checked out, however, the 224.00 has escalated to 276.00! When I contacted customer service I was told someone would get back to me. No one did.
